item.title: How do you get a server to say
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

means u rplace ure old writeplayers whit this one

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@SERVER NAME HERE!", 6570); sendFrame126("@yel@Owner@cya@=@whi@OWNER'S NAME HERE!", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

u can also make it change collors by using timers or make it flicker by putting the same senduest but whitout any tekst in it into public void update()

item.title: How do you get a server to say
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

[quote=“liltwixis11, post:9, topic:75779”][quote author=analrape link=topic=111252.msg1107721#msg1107721 date=1175941033]

[quote author=Odimaru link=topic=111252.msg1107706#msg1107706 date=1175940867]
OK, it worked… Sort of…

It says the server name, Admin’s name, player amount, ect… But it also says under all that.

lj5
lj6
lj7
lj8
lj9
lj10[/quote]
thx that worked, i had that problem to, i know its not my thread but do u know how to get it in the middle of the screen

well this can be easy fixed by placing a small space bar between the missing sendquests
i did this for u u just need to paste and copy 

public void writePlayers() {
    int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
    sendFrame126("", 13589);
    sendFrame126("", 13590);
    sendFrame126("BarteloScape", 13591);
    sendFrame126("Owner - Odimaru", 13592);
    sendFrame126("Hope you enjoy my server!", 13593);
    sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.sendFrame126("", 13594);
sendFrame126("", 13595);
sendFrame126("", 13596);
sendFrame126("", 13597);
sendFrame126("", 13598);
sendFrame126("", 13599);
sendFrame126("", 13600);
getPlayerCount(), 13594);
    setInterfaceWalkable(13588);
}

now still gonna be a jerk against me ?
[/quote][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 10:35:22 PM[/size][hr]odi, take out the getPlayerCount(), 13594);, u dont need it[/quote]take that out and the playercounting wont work,it doesnt mean that it says that in the 2nd error that its fuckd firstly fix the 1st error mostly it wil fix the 2nd error too if 2nd error still is there means u messed something up above that part

Read full topic

i did this for u u just need to paste and copy

public void writePlayers() {

    sendFrame126("", 13589);

item.title: How do you get a server to say
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

The server name, player amount, Admin’s name, ect. at the top of the screen? I’ve tried several methods and none of em seem to work…

The one below is in my server but it doesn’t say the shit at the top of the screen:

Right after public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
it says this:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126("BarteloScape", 13591); sendFrame126("Owner - Odimaru", 13592); sendFrame126("Hope you enjoy my server!", 13593); sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13594); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); }

Like I said, it’s in my server yet it doesn’t say that ANYWHERE in the server at all. Can someone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a server to say
